import React from 'react'; import { Eye } from 'lucide-react'; const ProjectCard = ({ project, onSelect }) => { const progressPercentage = (project.spent / project.budget) * 100; const dept = project.department || project.departmentName; const deptLower = dept ? dept.toLowerCase() : ''; return (
onSelect(project)}>
{project.id}
{project.name}
{project.status}
A/R
{(project.ar / 1000).toFixed(1)}k
A/P
{(project.ap / 1000).toFixed(1)}k
Profit/Loss
= 0 ? 'profit' : 'loss'}`}> ${Math.abs(project.profit / 1000).toFixed(1)}k
Team
{project.team}
90 ? 'danger' : progressPercentage > 70 ? 'warning' : 'success' }`}>
{progressPercentage.toFixed(1)}% of budget used
); }; export default ProjectCard;
